title: My 14 Day Suspension
body:
Today I was banned for using inappropriate language, I wasn't using inappropriate language to any one I know, I was directing to one of my real life friends IGN; xJk I did not mean for this to hurt anyone she said she didn't care about the encounter, I'm very sorry that I was being toxic. Could you please cut my ban or even get rid of it please? Oh and by the way your game is sick, and I promise I will turn my safechat on and never swear on your game ever again - Sincerly Sethih 

Could you please email me at this email (email removed) If you can Thank you. :)

Hey,

So unfortunately we cannot help you on the boards due to this being an account specific enquiry.

[ You can send in a ticket to Riot ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and discuss your case with a player support person. Since it is the holiday season replies may be a little slower, but please do not submit more than one ticket or keep "bumping" your existing one as it will make the process slower. 

Good luck ♥

*In the future, please remember that there are other people in your games that may react differently to things you say. They may not know that you are premade with your mate and could have seen it as an attack, something that all players have experienced and that the majority of which don't want to see in this community (hence the report that lead to your ban).*
